metadata.title: CVE-2023-5115 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An absolute path traversal attack exists in the Ansible automationplatform. This flaw allows an attacker to craft a malicious Ansible roleand make the victim execute the role. A symlink can be used to overwrite afile outside of the extraction path.

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
